guide.title: Query and Sorting
guide.description: A guide to query and search documents stored in Couchbase Lite.

introduction.paragraph: Couchbase Lite Query and Sorting features are using the same programming model you'll find in Couchbase Server. Everything is based on indexes created using a map and reduce function executed over the database documents. Once you have indexes, you can of course query them. That's it, now you have search features.
